text: int main ( ) { int arr [ 100000 ] , n , i , test , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test != 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i ] < arr [ i + 1 ] ) sum = sum + arr [ i ] ; else sum = sum + arr [ i + 1 ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; test -- ; sum = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
